name: Scale of the Leviathan
data: It increases the users wisdom poorly.
It increases the users intelligence unbelievably much.
It has adequate armour class for its type (tiny in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration unbelievably much.
This item loses its magical powers incredibly slowly.
It increases the users psionic resistance strongly.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'nerve mastery'.
It increases the users cold resistance somewhat.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'art of telepathy'.
